translated: The Chapter on the Conditions for the Occurrence of Phenomena
The Triad on the Unwholesome, the Triad on Feeling, etc.

original: Hetu🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nadukkhāya🔽vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: hetu  na saraṇam na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na dukkhāya  vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta  hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With respect to the clause “a state that is not a root and is related to unpleasant feeling,” etc.: With respect to the clause “a state that is not a root and is related to unpleasant feeling,” etc.: With respect to the clause “a state that is not a root and is related to neither-unpleasant-nor-pleasant feeling,” etc.: (In brief.)

original: Nasaraṇaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca  na saraṇam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca
translated: With respect to the clause “a state that is not a root and is not an effect,” etc.: (In brief.) With respect to the clause “a state that is not a root and is not an effect,” etc.: (In brief.) With respect to the clause “a state that is not a root and is neither an effect nor a state related to an effect,” etc.: (In brief.)

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na saraṇam na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
translated: With respect to the clause “a state that is not an effect and is related to a state that is not an effect,” etc.: (In brief.) With respect to the clause “a state that is not an effect and is related to a state that is not an effect,” etc.: (In brief.) With respect to the clause “a state that is not an effect and is related to a state that is both an effect and a state related to an effect,” etc.: (In brief.)🔽With respect to the clause “a state that is neither an effect nor a state related to an effect and is related to a state that is neither an effect nor a state related to an effect,” etc.: (In brief.) With respect to the clause “a state that is neither an effect nor a state related to an effect and is related to a state that is neither an effect nor a state related to an effect,” etc.: (In brief.) With respect to the clause “a state that is neither an effect nor a state related to an effect and is related to a state that is both an effect and a state related to an effect,” etc.: (In brief.)
